head.title: MOTT'S IS ACQUIRING MAUNA LA'I TROPICAL JUICE DRINKS

hedline.hl1: MOTT'S IS ACQUIRING MAUNA LA'I TROPICAL JUICE DRINKS

abstract.p: Mott's unit of Cadbury Schweppes PLC agrees, for undisclosed sum, to purchase Mauna La'i brand from Mauna La'i Tropicals Ltd (S)

block.p: The Mott's unit of Cadbury Schweppes P.L.C. agreed yesterday to acquire the Mauna La'i brand from Mauna La'i Tropicals Ltd. The purchase price was not disclosed. Mott's, based in Stamford, Conn., which makes Mott's applesauce and Hawaiian Punch fruit drink, said the Mauna La'i brand was a line of tropical juice drinks that had sales of more than $20 million last year. The deal does not include any manufacturing facilities or equipment.
